Replication System

This module handles the replication logic for the distributed chat system.

format(record)[source]

Format the specified record as text.

The record’s attribute dictionary is used as the operand to a string formatting operation which yields the returned string. Before formatting the dictionary, a couple of preparatory steps are carried out. The message attribute of the record is computed using LogRecord.getMessage(). If the formatting string uses the time (as determined by a call to usesTime(), formatTime() is called to format the event time. If there is exception information, it is formatted using formatException() and appended to the message.

class src.replication.replication_manager.ReplicationManager(host: str, port: int, replica_addresses: List[str], db)[source]

Bases: object

Manages replication between leader and follower servers. Implements a basic leader-follower protocol with majority acknowledgment, but now the ‘majority’ is computed from the currently active servers.

replicate_message(message_id: int, sender: str, recipient: str, content: str) → bool[source]

Attempt to replicate a chat message to the other alive followers. Requires a majority of active nodes to acknowledge.

replicate_account(username: str) → bool[source]

Replicate account creation to other alive followers. Requires a majority of active nodes to acknowledge.

replicate_operation(replication_request: ReplicationMessage) → bool[source]

Generic replication for delete operations or mark-read. Requires majority of active nodes.

handle_replication_message(message: ReplicationMessage) → ReplicationMessage[source]

Handle incoming replication messages from other servers (vote requests, heartbeats, etc.).
